## Data transformation

```{r}
#| message: false
library(dplyr)


```

### Column extraction

```{r}
class(white_wine)

class(pull(white_wine, quality))
```

With `dplyr`, `pull()` is the column extraction function, somewhat similiar to the dollar `$` operation and to the the double bracket `[[]]`.
